title: Diamond Top Laner LFT
body: Looking for a serious team to play up to challenger tier and tournaments with

replies.body:
Hi there Marksman55! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
lol makkam you know i have a diamond account you troll :P

I actually didn't know that tbh >.<

Maybe post on that to avoid confusion lol.
Serious Top laner, can definitely go far if given the right team.
